name: novapulsee
description: Modern SaaS platform built with NestJS and Next.js 15 for managing companies, users, projects, and tasks with complete multi-tenant isolation.

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "DOCKER,BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green,magenta" "npm run docker:up" "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.docker:up: docker-compose up -d mongodb redis && echo Docker services started
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run backend:install && npm run frontend:install
scripts.build:all: npm run backend:build && npm run frontend:build
